title: Design Autonomous Navigation System
description: Develop a system that allows robots to navigate autonomously on asteroids and planets.

title: Develop Resource Detection and Extraction Algorithms
description: Create algorithms for the robots to detect and extract resources from asteroids and planets.

title: Design Robot Structural Framework
description: Develop the physical structure of the robots to withstand space conditions.

title: Develop Robot Power Management System
description: Create a power management system for the robots to optimize energy usage.

title: Create Communication System for Robots and Ground Control
description: Develop a communication system that allows the robots to transmit data to ground control.
